snippet.title: Zombie Fun Run teaser trailer
snippet.description:
They're coming and we need your help! Join IRA, Crossing Guard Robot 2nd class, as he joins the Zombie Fun Run circuit and saves the day with the power of friendship and heavy artillery in this turn-based comedy RPG. The end of the world has never been so cozy!

From Zeboyd (Cthulhu Saves the World, Cosmic Star Heroine, This Way Madness Lies)

Trailer by @Darthaeris39 

Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2656830/Zombie_Fun_Run/
